Class DiscardPile

  • java.lang.Object
    • DiscardPile

  • public class DiscardPile
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulate a pile of discarded cards.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiscardPile()
      Create a DiscardPile that can accommodate a maximum of 52 Cards.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card getTopCard()
      Return the Card at the top of the DiscardPile.
      void setTopCard(Card card)
      Set the DiscardPile's top card to the specified Card object.
      Card topCard()
      Identify the top Card on the DiscardPile without removing this Card.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiscardPile

        public DiscardPile()
        Create a DiscardPile that can accommodate a maximum of 52 Cards. The DiscardPile is initially empty.

    • Method Detail

      • getTopCard

        public Card getTopCard()
        Return the Card at the top of the DiscardPile.
        Returns:
        Card object at top of DiscardPile or null if DiscardPile is empty

      • setTopCard

        public void setTopCard(Card card)
        Set the DiscardPile's top card to the specified Card object.
        Parameters:
        card - Card object being thrown on top of the DiscardPile

      • topCard

        public Card topCard()
        Identify the top Card on the DiscardPile without removing this Card.
        Returns:
        top Card, or null if DiscardPile is empty
